Articles.Content:
Okay, check this out. With my spacecraft im sending to Duna, I would love to speed up time to get there faster (who wouldnt?) But as i increase the time lapse speed, when i hit x100k time speed, this happens:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9ncFDxuwlOSam1zQS1Zd3NqMk0

For whatever reason, it thinks my batteries die and stops me from accelerating time. The worst part is, every time this happens, i have to go back and turn all my electrical devices back on. That in itself takes 2 minutes. Here are the stats at regular time, and x10k time accel respectively:

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9ncFDxuwlOSUkRJTUpkaldYZ0U

https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9ncFDxuwlOSZnBiX1dfemdHb3c

Any suggestions?

 

KSP Version 1.1.3

List of mods installed: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9ncFDxuwlOSYkVnMHRpNGxHakk

Output Log: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B9ncFDxuwlOSODh3S01qb3lXRnM
